architectural_notes: 2D fighting game mechanics with keyboard-based controls
Special ability system (domain expansion, black flash)

existing_features.title: Update character selection screen to display the new Streets of Tyson character roster with their themed portraits and stats
Create a login screen accessible by pressing the Q key that serves as the entry point to the game, using the existing Internet Identity authentication system
Update all UI text, branding, and references to reflect 'JJK Arena' as the official game name while keeping the Streets of Tyson character theme

new_feature_requests.summary: Character roster with all Streets of Tyson characters from books 1-25
Character selection screen for choosing fighters
Combat controls: W=jump, A=move back, S=crouch, D=move forward, G=punch, N=domain expansion, H=black flash, K=show moveset

Replace all existing Jujutsu Kaisen characters in the backend with a complete roster of Streets of Tyson characters from books 1 through 25, maintaining the existing Character type structure (id, name, attack, defense, speed, cursedEnergy, element, abilities, domainExpansion)
